page.title: 03THE WISTON BASILISK BY C.T.
page.content: Long ago there were many people who said that the Wiston Estate belonged to them.SO,someone came up with the idea that there should be a competition. Not very far away was a hole in the bank where the Basilisk lived. The Basilisk was black and yellow,between 1 and 2 feet long and it had eyes in the back of its head as well as the front. People would die if the Basilisk saw them and it would die if you saw him first.But that never happened. On with the competition,anyone who managed to kill the Basilisk they would inherit the castle. Many people tried and were killed.ONE man came up with the idea of going downhill in a barrel and look at the Basilisk before he was spotted.He succeeded and killed him and inherited all of WISTON ESTATE.
